messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: Brexit done. Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit done so the country can finally move on.
£33.9 billion extra for the NHS. Support for hospital and local GPs to give the healthcare you need.
20,000 extra police officers. Powers for them to keep us safe.
More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time we were just NNE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close.

issues.brexitEurope: Let's get Brexit done with our deal.
issues.economy: A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
issues.health: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS. Support for hospital and local GPs to give the healthcare you need.

contactInformation.address: Moss Farm, Church Lane, Scholar Green, Cheshire ST7 3QP
